text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
I'm grateful, Gentildonna-san. 
That you would accept my request for a Match Race.

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
You're welcome. I thought it was a good opportunity. 
Isn't it though? Because both of us――

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
We might be……similar. That "Strength", 
I would definitely like to experience for myself.

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
Oh, well then, please enjoy it to your heart's content. 
Today, I intend to prove it――

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text: That the one worthy to stand at the 『Peak』 as Queen, is me.

On that day, after Verxina's race, it was mentioned 
that Gentildonna would be aiming to make her debut.

Born in to a distinguished family with tremendous influence in the 
political and financial world, Gentildonna had a powerful presence.

If someone like that were to Debut at the same time, 
she would undoubtedly become a major obstacle for 
Verxina as she aimed for the 『Peak』――

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
But I must say, you're quite shrewd. If you were to stumble after 
your debut, then it would cast quite a long shadow over your career.

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
……Are you suggesting I might be avoiding 
facing you in an official race?

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
Depending on today's results, it wouldn't be a 
surprise if something like that might happen.

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
Fufuu……then it seems I have no choice but to prove 
which of us is the one that should be running away.

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
I'll engrave this in to you. 
That there are those strong enough to make you step aside.

And so, with a large crowd watching, 
the two make their way to their gates――

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text: ――Fuu, how valiant. I hope you can maintain that attitude.

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text: Oh, giving up already? However, I'm just getting started――!

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text: Haaaaaa――!!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
No way……!! 
Pulling away from that Gentildonna!?

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
(Of course! The one worthy of standing at the 『Peak』 is me! 
Just like this……to the last straight――)

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
Fufu……Ahahahaa! 
How wonderful, it just means there's value in crushing you――

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text: Hmmmph!!!!!!!

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text: (No way……why are those footsteps……!?)

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
(I thought I left them behind……she shouldn't be able 
to catch up. And the goal is right in front of me……!)

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text: (They're getting closer……that sound……I can feel it reverberating――)

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text: ――……Hiii.

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text: ――Haaaaaaaaaaaaa!!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Gentildonna!!!! What power! 
And it was the right timing to compete……!

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
No way……!!!! 
I'm going to lose……that can't……!!!!

text_block_list.name: Verxina & Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
――U……waaaaaaaaaaaah!!!! 
――Aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa!!!!

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text: ……Haaa, haaa, haaa ……cough.

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
Oh, my. How unsophisticated. 
I had slightly higher expectations for you……

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
……I suppose no more words need to be exchanged with someone so down. 
Well then, everyone――I'll be excusing myself here.

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text: Ugh…………

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
Everyone……I apologize. 
I will be turning down all scouting offers……

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
That can't be! Is it because you lost to Gentildonna? 
But, from now on you can reduce that difference――

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text: No! That's……not it.

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
Like this, I can't debut…… 
Anyways, for now……

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text: I'm sorry, please excuse me……!

I hurriedly chased after Verxina as she ran off. 
I still wanted to scout her no matter what.

Certainly, Gentildonna's strength was a sight to behold. 
It was understandable that a normal Uma Musume would be intimidated.

Was Verxina the same then? Was she going to give 
up after experiencing Gentildonna's strength up close?

She had been making an earnest effort in everything 
she did, all for her goal of reaching the 『Peak』

She would try and try again until she was satisfied. Would a girl 
like that really give up on her debut after just one defeat……?
But, when I found her back behind the school building――

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text: I……why did I……?

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text: Why……did I run away……?
……I couldn't bring myself to call out to her.

She seemed to be incredibly frustrated. But I was sure that she 
would continue forward with tenacity. However, right now she――

Why was she suddenly rejecting scouting attempts? 
It almost seemed like even she didn't know why.

The way she was withdrawing in to herself like a lost child 
didn't match up to my previous impressions of her at all.

She had always seemed to proud and dignified, 
so why was she so devastated now? To figure that out――
choice_data_list: (I need to learn more about her……!)

text_block_list.text:
Ehh～～ so you wanna know that badly, huh? 
Let's see～ just what should I do♪～?

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Then, Trainer-san～ 
You should listen to everything I say! Okay♪?
